spiritsExplanation:
The workout title 'Runner's Program #6 of 9' and description indicate that this workout is designed to complement a running training regime and is similar to '400m repeats,' suggesting a strong focus on high-intensity, sport-specific training. The metadata specifies a max rhythm of 28 and an interval format, both of which align with the 'High-Energy & Intense' spirit due to their implication of a fast pace and high-effort format, justifying the strong score of 0.95.

The 'Workout intensity level: 3 out of 3' further supports the classification of 'High-Energy & Intense', indicating maximal effort.

The reference to '400m repeats' from the description and the workout type 'Drive,standard,row' alongside advanced user fitness requirements point to a structured session focused on speed and performance, supporting a 'Sport & Agility' spirit with a score of 0.75.

The presence of pop and global hits, which typically have a strong beat, along with the 'Interval' format, suggest elements of 'Flow & Rhythm' given the importance of maintaining cadence with music, although this is less emphasized, contributing to a moderate score of 0.5. 'Soothing & Restorative' and 'Outdoor & Adventure' spirits were not applicable given the absence of recovery-focused or nature-based elements in the metadata.
